trans-unit.source: How to create a MySQL Database in Azure
trans-unit.target: How to create a MySQL Database in Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use ClearDB to create a MySQL database in an Azure data center.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use ClearDB to create a MySQL database in an Azure data center.

trans-unit.source: How to Create a MySQL Database in Azure

trans-unit.source: A sample that shows how to use MySQL with PHP on Azure is available at <https://github.com/WindowsAzure/azure-sdk-for-php-samples/tree/master/tasklist-mysql>.
trans-unit.target: A sample that shows how to use MySQL with PHP on Azure is available at <https://github.com/WindowsAzure/azure-sdk-for-php-samples/tree/master/tasklist-mysql>.
